name: wdio-declarative-net-request
description: A package allowing the use of declarativeNetRequest API for use with WebdriverIO by compiling a Chrome extension through a WebdriverIO service.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && bash scripts/add-type-reference.sh && bash scripts/copy-files.sh
scripts.keygen: crx keygen src/extension && mv src/extension/key.pem src/extension/dummy-dev-key.pem
